title: PK31 2 Seater Sofa Dark Tan
body: The PK31 2 Seater Sofa was designed in 1958 and Poul Kjærholm’s ability to create furniture that can be tailored to a room and still keep the identity of the single piece of furniture. The pronounced lines of the sofa, compliments the beauty that can be found in the smallest details. With uncompromising quality, comfort and style, this sofa is a stunning complement to your contemporary decor.
